resources.string: TouchSoftly is a proof of concept in how to make a screen overlay on top of anything.
Click on Start to see the overlay appear.
Click on Stop to remove the overlay.
Unfortunately it does not work properly due to the system permission required to be able to inject a page up/down keystroke event into an app.
The service was already started on boot. No need to start another copy.
The service is stopped but will restart again next time on boot.
Start the application automatically after boot
